text: @BBCNews We are a divided nation. When did we start seeing each other as the enemy. 100% on @realDonaldTrump and lack of courage by #GOP. President Trump's too-slow reaction to coronavirus pandemic killing tens of thousands of Americans.#COVID19 #coronavirus America RISE UP & fix it! RT!
